entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early in the evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
